titles.title: A resolution condemning the wrongful detainment of United States citizens and residents by the Russian Federation, and for other purposes.
A resolution condemning the wrongful detainment of United States citizens and residents by the Russian Federation, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary:
This resolution condemns Russia's wrongful detention of U.S. citizens and residents and demands their immediate release.
The resolution also
calls on the United States to designate Vladimir Kara-Murza as wrongfully detained under U.S. law; demands that Russian leadership be held accountable for their inhumane and unjust actions against their own citizens; and calls on the United States to designate Russia as a state sponsor of terrorism.
